tool_description: Utradea's Social Sentiment APIs to track social media activity in relation to stocks and cryptocurrencies. Start with /get-social-list endpoint to determine what stocks/cryptocurrencies you can search for across various endpoints.
name: Finance Social Sentiment For Twitter and StockTwits
title: Finance Social Sentiment For Twitter and StockTwits
tool_name: Finance Social Sentiment For Twitter and StockTwits

api_list.name: /get-social-timestamps/15m
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the total posts, comments, likes, impressions over a specified timeframe. Each timeframe is grouped by time intervals specified below.

api_list.name: /get-alerts
api_list.description: Search for alert notifications that identify changes in trading (price & volume), financial, & company news/announcement activities for a given stock or cryptocurrency.

api_list.name: /get-content
api_list.description:
Content Articles
Search for the latest Utradea generated articles that cover analysis, commentary, & due dilligence for a given stock or cryptocurrency.

api_list.name: /get-social-notifications
api_list.description:
Social Sentiment Notifications
Search for notifications that identify changes in social media activity for a given stock or cryptocurrency on Twitter, StockTwits, and Reddit.

api_list.name: /get-social-timestamps/4h
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the total posts, comments, likes, impressions over a specified timeframe. Social Activity is grouped by 4 hour intervals

api_list.name: /get-sentiment-trending/bullish
api_list.description: Search for top 50 trending bullish stocks/crypto symbols on Twitter/StockTwits.

api_list.name: /get-social-stats/influencers
api_list.description: Search for a stock or cryptocurrency's sentiment statistics from posts generated on Twitter or Stocktwits by user post category (influencers,spam,bot).

api_list.name: /get-social-stats/spam
api_list.description: Search for a stock or cryptocurrency's sentiment statistics from posts generated on Twitter or Stocktwits by user post category (influencers,spam,bot).

api_list.name: /get-social-stats/bots
api_list.description: Search for a stock or cryptocurrency's sentiment statistics from posts generated on Twitter or Stocktwits by user post category (influencers,spam, bot).

api_list.name: /get-sentiment-change/bearish
api_list.description: Search for top 50 trending stocks or crypto symbols on social media with the greatest change in bullish or bearish sentiment on Twitter/StockTwits.

api_list.name: /get-sentiment-change/bullish
api_list.description: Search for top 50 trending stocks or crypto symbols on social media with the greatest change in bullish or bearish sentiment on Twitter/StockTwits.

api_list.name: /get-sentiment-trending/bearish
api_list.description: Search for top 50 trending bearish stocks/crypto symbols on Twitter/StockTwits.

api_list.name: /get-filtered-feed
api_list.description: Search posts from Twitter or StockTwits that mention specified tickers. In the additional feeds provided, Utradea filters posts on your behalf based on our spam criteria and returns posts that reaches 10,000+ impressions.

api_list.name: /get-social-feed
api_list.description: Search posts from Twitter or StockTwits that mention specified tickers. In the additional feeds provided, Utradea filters posts on your behalf based on our spam criteria and returns posts that reaches 10,000+ impressions.

api_list.name: /get-social-change/impressions
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media with the greatest change in impressions.

api_list.name: /get-social-change/posts
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media with the greatest change in posts.

api_list.name: /get-social-trending/impressions
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media by impressions.

api_list.name: /get-social-trending/likes
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media by likes.

api_list.name: /get-social-trending/comments
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media by comments.

api_list.name: /get-social-trending/posts
api_list.description: Search the top 50 tickers trending on social media by posts.

api_list.name: /get-social-moving-averages/1m
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the moving average of posts, comments, likes, and impressions within a specified timeframe. The recorded social moving average is grouped by monthly intervals.

api_list.name: /get-social-moving-averages/2w
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the moving average of posts, comments, likes, and impressions within a specified timeframe. The recorded social moving average is grouped by 2-week intervals.

api_list.name: /get-social-moving-averages/1w
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the moving average of posts, comments, likes, and impressions within a specified timeframe. The recorded social moving average is grouped by 1 week intervals.

api_list.name: /get-social-moving-averages/72h
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the moving average of posts, comments, likes, and impressions within a specified timeframe. The recorded social moving average is grouped by 72-hour intervals.

api_list.name: /get-social-timestamps/1d
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the total posts, comments, likes, impressions over a specified timeframe. Social activity is grouped by 1 day intervals

api_list.name: /get-social-timestamps/1h
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the total posts, comments, likes, impressions over a specified timeframe. Social activity is grouped by 1-hour intervals

api_list.name: /get-social-timestamps/30m
api_list.description: Search for a ticker and capture the total posts, comments, likes, impressions over a specified timeframe. Social activity is grouped in 30 min intervals.

api_list.name: /get-social-list
api_list.description:
Get a list of tickers across social media platforms: Twitter, StockTwits, and Reddit. These are tickers that are currently mentioned across each platform. 
Use these tickers to query the remaining endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finance-social-sentiment-for-twitter-and-stocktwits.p.rapidapi.com/get-social-list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finance-social-sentiment-for-twitter-and-stocktwits.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finance-social-sentiment-for-twitter-and-stocktwits.p.rapidapi.com/get-social-list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finance-social-sentiment-for-twitter-and-stocktwits.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
